raw akas.title: Wireface: The KNA TV-13 News Reports

akas: Wireface: The KNA TV-13 News Reports (original title)
Wireface: The Thomas Lloyd Reports (new title)
akas from release info: Wireface: The KNA TV-13 News Reports (original title)
Wireface: The Thomas Lloyd Reports (new title)

1.title: August 30th

episode of.title: Wireface: The KNA TV-13 News Reports (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: An Amber Alert is issued for a troubled local teen. Thomas Lloyd reports.

2.title: September 2nd

episode of.title: Wireface: The KNA TV-13 News Reports (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Three days and still no new details about missing Statesville teen Julie Stafford. Julie's mother sits down to discuss the details surrounding her daughter's disappearance and the police response thus far. Thomas Lloyd reports.

3.title: September 6th

episode of.title: Wireface: The KNA TV-13 News Reports (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: A second Statesville teen disappears while the first remains missing. Statesville police spokesperson Stephanie Jackson provides and update on both cases. Thomas Lloyd reports.

4.title: September 20th

episode of.title: Wireface: The KNA TV-13 News Reports (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Nearly three weeks since Statesville teens Julie Stafford and Emily Riley disappeared and still no clues. Melinda Stone, Emily's aunt, believes the girls have been abducted and the police know more than they let on. Thomas Lloyd reports.

5.title: September 22nd

episode of.title: Wireface: The KNA TV-13 News Reports (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Julie Stafford's body is discovered near Statesville Park and a third girl goes missing. Thomas Lloyd reports.

6.title: September 27th

episode of.title: Wireface: The KNA TV-13 News Reports (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Emily Riley's body is found. Police still have no new details about the third missing teen and the public is on edge. Thomas Lloyd reports.

7.title: October 1st

episode of.title: Wireface: The KNA TV-13 News Reports (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: Police Chief Hays hold a press conference to update details about Sarah Diamond's death. Thomas Lloyd reports.

8.title: October 14th

episode of.title: Wireface: The KNA TV-13 News Reports (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: In an exclusive interview, Farrah Savage, mother of the fourth murdered Statesville teen, reveals details about her daughter's death the police are hiding. But why? Thomas Lloyd Reports.

9.title: October 21st

episode of.title: Wireface: The KNA TV-13 News Reports (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: This segment featuring police spokesperson Stephanie Jackson was intended to be an introduction to a new direction in the case. It never aired. Thomas Lloyd reports.

10.title: October 22nd

episode of.title: Wireface: The KNA TV-13 News Reports (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: The F.B.I. takes over the investigation and provides details the police were reluctant to confirm. Thomas Lloyd reports.

11.title: November 2nd

episode of.title: Wireface: The KNA TV-13 News Reports (TV Series 2011– )

11.plot: After a brief respite from the terror, Carly French is found murdered and believed to be the sixth victim of the Statesville serial killer. Thomas Lloyd reports.

12.title: November 8th

episode of.title: Wireface: The KNA TV-13 News Reports (TV Series 2011– )

12.plot: Agent Styles gives an update on the seventh missing girl and issues a formal apology. Thomas Lloyd reports.

13.title: November 15th

episode of.title: Wireface: The KNA TV-13 News Reports (TV Series 2011– )

13.plot: More than two weeks has passed since the seventh Statesville teen has gone missing. Allison Sawyer's mother gives an emotional plea for her daughter's return. Thomas Lloyd reports.

14.title: November 18th

episode of.title: Wireface: The KNA TV-13 News Reports (TV Series 2011– )

14.plot: Breaking news on the disappearance of Allison Sawyer, the seventh teen feared to be the latest victim of the Statesville serial killer. Thomas Lloyd reports.

15.title: January 15th

episode of.title: Wireface: The KNA TV-13 News Reports (TV Series 2011– )

15.plot: Almost a month since Allison Sawyer was found alive and still no arrests in the "Wireface" serial killings. Thomas Lloyd reports for the final time.

imdb.plot outline: What began with one missing girl eventually consumed an entire county with fear for months. Follow the story of the Statesville "Wireface" serial killings pieced together from local news reports featuring once down-on-his-luck human interest reporter Thomas Lloyd as he seeks the truth the police and FBI don't want to admit.
imdb.title: Wireface: The KNA TV-13 News Reports
plot: The complete KNA TV-13 _News_ (qv) reports detailing the Fall 2010 kidnappings and murders of seven teenage girls from the town of Statesville by the serial killer known as "Wireface". (Part 3 of 3 of The Wireface Saga)::M. Alexander

What began with one missing girl eventually consumed an entire county with fear for months. Follow the story of the Statesville "Wireface" serial killings pieced together from local news reports featuring once down-on-his-luck human interest reporter Thomas Lloyd as he seeks the truth the police and FBI don't want to admit.::M. Alexander
